product_name: Outdoor Research Contour Shorts - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The women's soft-shell Contour Shorts from Outdoor Research are a durable staple for everything from boulder-hopping to battling up granite walls. Stretchy, tightly-woven Cordura(R) nylon/spandex fabric blocks wind and resists water, yet breathes well and is quick-drying. Gusseted crotch facilitates ease of movement. Low-profile waist fits comfortably under a harness. Features hand pockets and front-zippered thigh pockets that are accessible while wearing a harness. Contour Shorts from Outdoor Research feature a standard fit. Closeout.
short_description: The women's soft-shell Contour Shorts from Outdoor Research are a durable staple for everything from boulder-hopping to battling up granite walls.
